verbose_text: Herein, we designed and engineered an efficient theranostic nanoagent (PFTQ-PEG-Gd NPs) based on semiconducting conjugated framework and gadolinium ion to realize the deep tissue penetration of enhanced MRI and the fine spatial resolution as well as high signal-to-noise ratio of PAI / NIR-II fluorescence imaging guided cancer PTT activated by a NIR laser irradiation (Scheme XREF_FIG).
